post:
Hi all,

for a few school projects I need an vps dedicated to run java tomcat or jboss application server.
I used to use a free testing vps from XenVZ for it, but it is about to expire, and so I was wondering
if there were any nice providers left to sponsor me for a few months (max until June).
Requirements are pretty low, it runs fine on 256mb ram and not a lotta disk space is needed too.



If not, sorry for posting here.
Have a great day all!

PS: I am from NL, Europe, so Europe would be preferred but US is fine too :)
